Texts.Eng: Different combs contain very different resources. Experimentation is part of the challenge!
Texts.Chs: 不同的蜂巢可以提炼出不同的材料，这些就需要你亲自实验了。

Texts.Eng: Place the combs within a wooden centrifuge^reset;, which you can build at the Machining Table, and collect the ^orange;wax chunks^reset; from within.
Texts.Chs: 请从加工台制作一个^cyan;木制离心机^reset;，试图把蜂巢放进去，然后提取一些^orange;蜂蜡^reset;吧。
